batch_role: Group management system for handling group rooms, user roles, and program functionalities.
key_features: Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for group room responses.
User role management with hierarchy and access control.
Entity classes representing group rooms and users.
Repository interfaces for CRUD operations and custom queries.
Service layer for managing group-related functionalities such as invitations, member management, and problem handling.
project_hints: The project involves managing group programs or activities.
Role-based access control for users within groups.
Functionality related to group invitations and join requests.
User management system focusing on user roles and statuses within various programs.
